Landing.LandingTitle: Learn spanish or french online with a fully certified teacher from the comfort of your home
Landing.LandingList1: Affordable classes in small groups or private
Landing.LandingList3: Fully online, no need to move
Landing.MainTitle: An atmosphere of easy and progressive communication
Landing.MainDescription: Sign up for a linguistic club and learn foreign languages by communicating. The Lingua Talker communicative method will allow you to start speaking from the very first lesson

ChooseUs.Title: Why choosing us
ChooseUs.Argument1.Title: Small groups
ChooseUs.Argument1.Description: You will get more attention from our experts and you will have more opportunities to practice.
ChooseUs.Argument2.Title: Qualified specialists
ChooseUs.Argument2.Description: With a linguistic or pedagogical education. We are in love with foreign languages and are passionate about our cause,
ChooseUs.Argument3.Title: Reasonable prices
ChooseUs.Argument3.Description: What are you waiting for? Sign up for a free trial lesson.
ChooseUs.Argument4.Title: Mobility
ChooseUs.Argument4.Description: You can study from anywhere in the world. All you need is an Internet access and a great mood.

Quotation.QuotationLanguageTitle: Which language do you want to learn ?

Quotation.UnscheduledPrivateClassSummary: Get private classes with our teacher on a custom schedule for {{ price }} {{ currency }}

AboutUs.NataliaDesc: Expert in online teaching, certified and current translator and interpreter for embassies. Graduated from the Moscow State University and Collège universitaire Français. Teaching since 2013 to students of all ages, including schoolchildren, university students, or professionals from entertainment and fashion industry.
AboutUs.FredericDesc: Teaching French online since 2016, and has lived in 5 different countries since 2012, Frederic is also a software engineer and is dedicated to create the best tools to assist language learners.

WhyUs.ArgumentDesc1: Start speaking from the first lessons.
WhyUs.ArgumentDesc2: We are always ready to answer all your questions and fill your knowledge gaps.
WhyUs.ArgumentDesc3: Linguistic or teacher education. We are in love with foreign languages and are passionate about our business.
WhyUs.ArgumentDesc4: We use presentations, scans, audio and video materials, communication games and exercises
WhyUs.ArgumentDesc5: We form in our students all the necessary skills for successful mastering of a foreign language: speaking, listening, reading, grammar, phonetics, vocabulary and writing.
WhyUs.ArgumentDesc6: You will receive more attention from our experts and you will have more opportunities to practice.
WhyUs.ArgumentDesc7: You can practice from anywhere in the world. All you need is a computer, tablet or phone and the Internet.
